review: The training session was very helpful and the instructor explained concepts clearly.
I did not enjoy the pace of the training, it felt rushed.
Excellent course structure and practical examples, I learned a lot.
The content was outdated and not very engaging.
I am satisfied with the training, it improved my understanding of the topic.
The assignments were too difficult without enough guidance.
Great teaching style, interactive and informative sessions.
The course could have included more real-world case studies.
I liked the overall experience, but some modules were too long.
The trainer was knowledgeable and addressed queries patiently.
